question:
You have been busy with your studies for the past month and haven't had time to visit your family.


Write a letter to your grandmother. In your letter:


Apologize for not getting in touch with her sooner
Explain why you have been so busy
Arrange a time to visit
Write at least 150 words. You do NOT need to write any addresses.


Begin your letter as follows:


Dear Grandmother,
text: How are you? I hope this letter finds you well. I'm writing to apologise for not writing more often.

I know you've been a bit sick and would have wanted me to be there, I'm really sorry for not keeping in touch. Hope you know I miss you all and cannot wait to go back home to visit you guys. I know my busy schedule grants no excuse for ghosting my own family, so please let me explain what happened.

As you know granny, this is my final year of university, and because of that some of the assignments have kept me extremely occupied. I was actually very close to failing one of the major subjects of the academic program. If that would have happened I would have most likely missed graduation this year. Once again I want to express how sorry I am and because of that, I want to make it up to you.

I would love to visit you soon! Because your birthday is coming soon I want to take you out for dinner next time I visit. I know you like to gather with your girlfriends this time of the year, so please let me know which date you will be available for me to give you this present.
Can't wait to hear back from you soon.
